attributes.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 Rap
attributes.caption: Another year, another Call of Duty rap. This time it's Black Ops 2 that gets the nod.
attributes.description: Another year, another Call of Duty rap. This time it's Black Ops 2 that gets the nod.
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 Rap

attributes.title: Dead Space 3 Rap - "Keeping Me Human"
attributes.caption: You're alone in space and certain death is around every corner. What's there left to keep you sane? Listen forth as this song explores that question.
attributes.description: You're alone in space and certain death is around every corner. What's there left to keep you sane? Listen forth as this song explores that question.

attributes.title: Crysis 3 Rap - "The Prophet"
attributes.caption: Prophet is a badass protagonist that demands a song of his own and here you have it.
attributes.description: Prophet is a badass protagonist that demands a song of his own and here you have it.

attributes.title: Tomb Raider Rap - "Looks Can Kill"
attributes.caption: Lara Croft is a babe, but there's definitely a certain edge to that beauty. Tread lightly.
attributes.description: Lara Croft is a babe, but there's definitely a certain edge to that beauty. Tread lightly.

attributes.title: Gears of War Judgement Rap - "Kilo Squad"
attributes.caption: Another track about the burly, badass and deadly soldiers from the Gears of War franchise.
attributes.description: Another track about the burly, badass and deadly soldiers from the Gears of War franchise.
attributes.display_title: Gears of War Judgement Rap - "Kilo Squad"

attributes.title: Bioshock Infinite Rap
attributes.caption: Sadly this was the last Bioshock game ever made but it is not the last JTM Bioshock song ever made.
attributes.description: Sadly this was the last Bioshock game ever made but it is not the last JTM Bioshock song ever made.

attributes.title: Dead Island Riptide Rap
attributes.caption: The sleazy travel guide returns again to get you back to the lovely Island.
attributes.description: The sleazy travel guide returns again to get you back to the lovely Island.

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed 3 DLC Rap - "Born Into Tyranny"
attributes.caption: The only ever DLC to get a song from us follows in the footsteps of the first AC3 rap.
attributes.description: The only ever DLC to get a song from us follows in the footsteps of the first AC3 rap.
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed 3 DLC Rap - "Born Into Tyranny"

attributes.title: Last Of Us Rap - "A Reason to Live"
attributes.caption: When the world has gone to shit and you're all alone you gotta find the right reason to push on. This song encompasses Joel's perspective on survival.
attributes.description: When the world has gone to shit and you're all alone you gotta find the right reason to push on. This song encompasses Joel's perspective on survival.
attributes.display_title: Last Of Us Rap - "A Reason to Live"

attributes.title: Saints Row IV Rap - "Rockin' Purple"
attributes.caption: Saints Row is chaotic and random and so is this song.
attributes.description: Saints Row is chaotic and random and so is this song.

attributes.title: GTA V Rap - "Yo Hood Ain't Hood Enough"
attributes.caption: Taking a lot of inspiration from the GTA IV soundtrack, the instrumentals in this song compliment the franchise seamlessly.
attributes.description: Taking a lot of inspiration from the GTA IV soundtrack, the instrumentals in this song compliment the franchise seamlessly.
attributes.display_title: GTA V Rap - "Yo Hood Ain't Hood Enough"

attributes.title: Battlefield 4 Rap - "Love is a Battlefield"
attributes.caption: We were listening to a lot of Justin Timberlake around the time that this song was made...couldn't you tell?
attributes.description: We were listening to a lot of Justin Timberlake around the time that this song was made...couldn't you tell?

attributes.title: Call of Duty Ghosts Rap - "The Ghosts"
attributes.caption: CoD Ghosts was quite the contentious game and honestly one that under delivered for us. However, we are extremely happy with how this song turned out.
attributes.description: CoD Ghosts was quite the contentious game and honestly one that under delivered for us. However, we are extremely happy with how this song turned out.
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty Ghosts Rap - "The Ghosts"

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed 4 Rap - "The Black Flag is Risin'"
attributes.caption: If pirates, assassins and rap music are your thing then you're in luck with this video.
attributes.description: If pirates, assassins and rap music are your thing then you're in luck with this video.
attributes.display_title: Assassin's Creed 4 Rap - "The Black Flag is Risin'"

attributes.title: Ryse: Son of Rome Rap
attributes.caption: You may remember Ryse Son of Rome for it's gorgeous graphics with the Xbox One launch. You may not remember this song though. This is an under the radar JTM song.
attributes.description: You may remember Ryse Son of Rome for it's gorgeous graphics with the Xbox One launch. You may not remember this song though. This is an under the radar JTM song.
